extendedInfo.description: Romania Hotel 80% Discount is one of the largest hotel comparison site with more than 1000++ hotels booking in Romania.Key Features-Hotel Reservations made easy with this Romania Hotel app. Simple and secure booking process.-There are no fees, no mark-ups and it is FREE to use.Use our hotel guest reviews and opinions from genuine customers to find the perfect hotel for you â we even ?include TripAdvisor reviews!-Reserve your hotel in Romania with ease and at the best rate from your phone. -Search for nearby hotels or hostels or budget hotel in Romania-The only app that allow you to search all the hotel deals in All other Countries.-Hotel information, guest reviews, photos, descriptions, maps of hotel.-Up to 80% discounts on hotels, hostels and motels. Instant online and phone bookings available with immediate room confirmation.-Choose your favorite brands including; Hilton, Marriott, Best Western, Sheraton, Holiday Inn and many more.-Hotel Reservations made easy with this Romania Hotel app. Simple and secure booking process. One search and our app will search all the listed hotels and give you the best prices in one screen for all the deals.  You will see a list of price comparison of the website listed here:www.Agoda.com, www.Expedia.com, www.booking.comlastminute.compriceline.comand many more websiteBook your room now!
